page.title: 06HEALTH - DOCTOR & CHEMIST
page.content: {BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375} HEALTH 1.Doctor:3 Doctors - 10 hr day. 8 years training.Senior partner Dr O'Sullivan.Rota, emergency call.Infirmary, Dentist.7000 patients. Little Leigh, Anderton, Comberbach, Barnton.90 people daily.Most common illness:chest infection.Most common age:up to 10, old people.Most prescribed drug:pencillin. 7 receptionists - 8hour day. Chemist: 9a.m. - 6 p.m. 4 years training - 3 university, 1 practical. 850 prescriptions weekly.Medical advice.Electrical tablet County Computer.Sants wholesalers, Stoke-on- Trent Suppliers and delivers. Anti- biotics, painkillers, tranquilizers prescribed. Painkillers, cough mixture antacids - bought.Baby goods.Rota, after hours emergency opening.
